name: Zombies N Stuff
description:
How long can you survive?

Zombies N Stuff is a top down survival shooter featuring zombies, guns and lots of blood.

This is still an early version of the game. Seeing that it's fun to play, I am now working on a leveling up and perks system.

Music by Jeff Frank, you can find more of his awesome stuff here https://soundcloud.com/jeff-frank-

Art by Mutte,
http://www.blendswap.com/user/Mutte
